entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pukatawagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:28 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
